messages.title: KERRY'S ELECTION COMMITMENTS
messages.content: Working for a fairer, more equal society and challenged all forms of discrimination. Ensure that economic recovery is fairly distributed. Building relationships with local businesses and educational institutions.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Relaunch the case for a 'Teaching Hospital' attached to Herts University to train our own doctors and nurses.
Ensure that every child gets a great start in life with smaller class sizes and one-to-one support.
To support our local traders and businesses, build affordable homes.
Ensure that economic recovery is fairly distributed.

issues.economy: Ensure that economic recovery is fairly distributed. Debt has doubled. Wages are down. Working family tax credits and child benefit cut.
issues.education: Smaller class sizes and one-to-one support.
issues.health: Relaunch the case for a 'Teaching Hospital' attached to Herts University to train our own doctors and nurses.
issues.socialWelfare: Fighting to protect welfare benefits from Tory cuts.

housing.content: To support our local traders and businesses, build affordable homes.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am looking forward to the challenges ahead and excited at the prospect of being elected once again as MP for my home city of St Albans - a huge honour for me and that I will faithfully discharge.

quotes.text: A well known and much liked figure - boundless energy and enthusiasm for the job of MP...
